mini3

Interface Player

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    InteractivePlayer, RandomPlayer

    public interface Player
    TicTacToe Game Player interface. Any class that implements this interface can be imported to the TicTacToeTest to play the game.
    Author:
    Guang Song

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void gameOver(TicTacToeGame g)
      Informs player of final game state when game ends.
      java.lang.String getName()
      Returns a string name for this player.
      Move play(TicTacToeGame g)
      Returns a valid move for the given game.

    • Method Detail

      • play

        Move play(TicTacToeGame g)
        Returns a valid move for the given game.
        Parameters:
        g - current game state
        Returns:
        a valid move for the game

        void gameOver(TicTacToeGame g)
        Informs player of final game state when game ends.
        Parameters:

        java.lang.String getName()
        Returns a string name for this player.
